channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 在持有日本股票的过程中，这个投资者获得了 1900% 的回报率，但却一直保持低调。
item.description:
An investor that made a 1,900% return mostly kept a low profile while holding Japanese stocks.

Now it's embarking on a series of public demands for change. https://t.co/yaSad42ouN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 铁矿石重拾跌势，逼近七个月低点，接近每吨 100 美元的水平
item.description:
Iron ore resumed its decline, closing in on a seven-month low and nearing the $100-a-ton level https://t.co/mRELZ4DL9o

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 萨尔瓦多取消了海外投资和汇款所得税，以吸引资本和富有的外国人
item.description:
El Salvador eliminated income tax on investment from overseas and remittances to attract capital and wealthy foreigners https://t.co/gkowxxyB8Q

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚最大的贷款机构称，2 月份澳大利亚家庭支出下降
item.description:
Australia’s household spending declined in February, the nation’s largest lender said https://t.co/E1E4CJjIrT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 丰田公司全额满足了工会提出的增加工资和奖金的要求，这再次表明，在中央银行考虑加息之际，可持续的工资-物价周期可能正在形成。
item.description:
Toyota met its labor union’s demands for increases in salary and bonuses in full, in another sign a sustainable wage-price cycle may be taking hold as the central bank considers hiking interest rates https://t.co/2wV0VGU9c9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 佳能支持的日本初创公司 Space One 的火箭在发射后不久发生爆炸
item.description:
A rocket of Space One, a Japanese startup backed by Canon, exploded soon after its launch https://t.co/pReodMxc9j

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 碧桂园首次未能支付人民币债券的票息，在面临离岸清算诉讼时雪上加霜
item.description:
Country Garden missed a coupon payment on a yuan bond for the first time, adding to the woes as it faces a lawsuit seeking its liquidation offshore https://t.co/s0v75As2pb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 由于市场猜测政府将采取措施维持该行业产能的快速增长，中国陷入困境的太阳能制造商的股价在最近几天出现反弹。
item.description:
China’s beleaguered solar manufacturers have seen their shares rebound in recent days as speculation mounts the government will take steps to maintain the industry’s rapid build-up of capacity https://t.co/ahXMOssYUr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 韩国当局准备延长韩元交易时段，将再次对韩元盘后交易进行测试
item.description:
South Korea will undertake another test of after-hours trading of the won as authorities prepare to extend the currency’s trading session https://t.co/R33eh3UiPJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登承诺调查工会要求其政府审查中国对造船企业补贴的请愿书
item.description:
US President Joe Biden pledged to look into a petition from unions asking his administration to review China’s subsidies for shipbuilders https://t.co/WRvAx0XzYl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 随着资产管理公司转向信贷，基础交易被认为正在减少
item.description:
Basis Trade Is Seen Dwindling as Asset Managers Pivot to Credit https://t.co/hrqelaK0aA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 尽管监管机构加大了对冲基金和富人匿名投资的难度，但通过一种不为人知的离岸衍生工具流入印度的外国资金仍在增加
item.description:
Foreign fund flows into India through an obscure offshore derivative are rising even as regulators make it harder for hedge funds and wealthy individuals to invest anonymously https://t.co/hc2biq3zTG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在玉米和大豆价格暴跌的情况下，巴西政府正在为违约农民和陷入拖欠债务困境的农业公司准备一揽子救援计划
item.description:
Brazil’s government is preparing a rescue package for farmers in default and agricultural companies struggling with delinquency amid tumbling corn and soybean prices https://t.co/Zy1gZdz4bl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 一些外国公司正在减持其印度业务的股份，利用印度股票市场的繁荣筹集现金
item.description:
Some foreign companies are paring stakes in their Indian businesses, taking advantage of the nation’s booming equity market to raise cash https://t.co/KDI3IYsWxd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 由于预期日本央行可能在下周加息，RBC BlueBay 将抛售日本政府债券作为首要赌注。
item.description:
RBC BlueBay has made selling Japanese government bonds a top wager on expectations the central bank is likely to raise interest rates next week https://t.co/v9ASXA3JTU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 欧洲私募股权公司 HQ Capital 聘用前 Ardian 高管 Michael Hu 担任亚洲区主管，并在新加坡开设了新办事处
item.description:
European private equity firm HQ Capital hired former Ardian executive Michael Hu as head of Asia and opened a new office in Singapore https://t.co/SsmzdW88fM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 彭博贸易追踪报告显示，面对持续的供应链中断，强劲的需求使全球货运出现了不太可能出现的反弹。
item.description:
Resilient demand has allowed global shipments to pull off an unlikely rebound in the face of continuing supply chain disruptions, according to the Bloomberg Trade Tracker https://t.co/aMvr88zOT1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 随着日本央行即将加息，股票投资者面临的一个关键问题是，决策者计划如何处理 4750 亿美元的 ETF？
item.description:
With the BOJ set to raise interest rates, a key question for stock investors is what policymakers plan to do with $475 billion of ETFs https://t.co/5qJKEKFcOL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚狮城矿业公司（Liontown）已同意获得 3.64 亿美元的贷款，这将使其关键的凯瑟琳谷（Kathleen Valley）锂矿项目能够在今年投产，成为这家初级矿业公司的生命线。
item.description:
Australia’s Liontown has agreed to a $364 million loan that will enable it to get its key Kathleen Valley lithium project into production this year, a lifeline for the junior miner https://t.co/lNDzUVWz64

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 英国与美国第二大州得克萨斯州签署了一项新的贸易协定，旨在促进绿色能源、航空航天和先进技术领域的合作
item.description:
The UK has signed a new trade pact with Texas, the second-largest state in the US, in an effort to boost cooperation in green energy, aerospace and advanced technologies https://t.co/wNtxmwEBf2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 韩国计划审查潜在高风险投资产品的销售情况，因为调查发现，银行向散户投资者误售了与中国挂钩的结构性产品，这些散户投资者正面临着 40 多亿美元的损失。
item.description:
South Korea plans to review the sale of potentially high-risk investments after a probe found that banks missold China-linked structured products to retail investors who are facing more than $4 billion in losses https://t.co/1mIdfzHIJ5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 以下是有关石油市场的最新消息和分析
item.description:
Here’s the latest news and analysis on the oil market https://t.co/8V65Q9Q03G

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 自政府上月取消额外房产税以来，香港的房屋销售已恢复活力，但供应过剩意味着房价反弹可能需要更长的时间。
item.description:
Hong Kong’s home sales have roared back to life since the government scrapped extra property taxes last month, but a supply glut means a rebound in prices is likely to take much longer https://t.co/FR4pScrOll

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员皮埃尔-旺施（Pierre Wunsch）表示，决策者最终将不得不在不能完全确定通胀率正在回归 2% 目标的情况下降低利率。
item.description:
ECB Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch says policymakers will eventually have to lower rates without being completely sure that inflation is returning to the 2% target https://t.co/xR3D21M8MR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 阿根廷置换 500 亿美元地方债务以提前还款

Argentina Swaps $50 Billion of Local Debt to Push Out Repayments https://t.co/rq3lPZSdFD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 中国地方政府融资工具正转向更多样化的债务解决方案，试图避免债务违约，因为地方政府的借贷习惯已成为中国政府的首要经济议程。
item.description:
Chinese local government financing vehicles are turning to more diverse fixes for spiraling debt, trying to avoid default as their borrowing habits become a top economic agenda in Beijing https://t.co/VqPGUICpCm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 新加坡一位部长警告说，经济不确定性将拖累该国房地产业，因为房屋销售显示需求疲软
item.description:
A Singapore minister cautioned that economic uncertainties will weigh on the country’s real estate industry, as home sales show flagging demand https://t.co/dHWtmenRVG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 日本央行将在官员们看到春季工资谈判的初步统计结果后决定是否在 3 月份加息，目前结果尚不确定
item.description:
The Bank of Japan will decide whether to raise rates in March after officials see the initial tally from spring wage talks, with the outcome currently too close to call https://t.co/C7f6jLnycz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024
